response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both parties. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an introductory price of $7,200. This special offer not only saves you $800 but also secures your investment in a top-tier solution that will undoubtedly enhance your experience. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7200}
